content: **drops crochet shawl with stripes in vienna ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **measurements** width approx 200 cm / 78 7 length approx 90 cm / 35 4 **materials** drops vienna from garnstudio 50 g colour no 69 avocado 50 g colour no 12 turquoise 50 g colour no 25 jeans blue 50 g colour no 21 off-white 50 g colour no 42 brown 50 g colour no 43 light brown 50 g colour no 56 orange-yellow 50 g colour no 28 fuchsia 50 g colour no 68 light burgundy 50 g colour no 16 moss green drops crochet hook size 9 mm / m/n - or size needed to obtain 4 vertical row = 10 cm measured in the st direction and not along middle of shawl
